description:
The soft hand and thin diameter of this rope makes it suited to onsite attempts, redpoints and superlight alpine tours. For extended top-roping sessions you may want to choose a thicker, workhorse rope. The sheath of the We Care edition is made using leftover yarns from other ropes, cutting down on the environmental footprint and creating a unique pattern.

  • Dry treatment on both sheath and core protects against water and dirt
  • Coated yarns allow individual fibres to glide over each other, reducing internal friction and fully utilizing each yarn when loaded, for extra durability
  • Comes lap-coiled by the factory, so ready to climb
  • High sheath percentage increases durability
name: Mammut 9.5 Crag We Care Dry Rope
